definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: First, you need to find the roaches’ colonies.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你需要找到小強的老巢。
小強癡迷於玩電腦遊戲。

sentences.english: Seeing roaches swarm is absolutely disgusting, so be prepared.
sentences.chinese: 看小強成羣的爬肯定很噁心，所以要有心理準備。

sentences.english: Every April Fool 's Day, Xiaoqiang would think of ways to trick others.
sentences.chinese: 小強每年愚人節都想着法子捉弄別人。

sentences.english: Chinese chalk acts like boric acid as it abrades the roach’s shell.
sentences.chinese: 中國粉筆像硼酸一樣可以損傷小強的外殼。

sentences.english: With its shell damaged, the roach will soon die of dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 隨着它的外殼受損，小強會很快死於脫水。

sentences.english: My parents call me Xiaoqiang. I have no other name.
sentences.chinese: 我父母叫我小強，此外沒有別的名字。

sentences.english: Xiao Qiang and Xiao Li start walking to school at the same time from their homes.
sentences.chinese: 小強和小麗同時從自己家裏走向學校。

sentences.english: "But Mommy, i am sat by daddy. " little Johnny replys.
sentences.chinese: “但是，媽咪，我坐在爸爸的旁邊”小強尼回答。

sentences.english: The following is a list of roach extermination techniques using simple tools.
sentences.chinese: 下面列出了一系列使用簡單工具的小強消滅術。

sentences.english: Average cockroaches are already known for their incredible resilience.
sentences.chinese: 普通的小強已經顯示出了令人難以置信的生存力。

sentences.english: Lucy: The latest Cockroach Is Crawling.
sentences.chinese: 最新一期的小強爬行記啊。

sentences.english: Jack Bauer is rent a house to monitor LanXin of the same building.
sentences.chinese: 小強租房子的原因就是想監視同一幢樓的藍馨。

sentences.english: Xiaoqiang on the table has been looking for.
LanXin learned Yu Xiaojiang from franks mouth when her relatives, a little touched.
sentences.chinese: 藍馨從費蘭克口中得知於小強把她當親屬，有點感動。

definition: junior female student or apprentice/daughter (younger than oneself) of one's teacher
to scare/to intimidate/to threaten/(interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut/(interjection showing astonishment)
cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
(typically followed by 就[jiu4]) apt to (lose one's temper, catch a cold etc)/at the drop of a hat
to infuriate/to be furious/to die from an excess of anger
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
